traits.name: Action Surge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The downcast mercenary takes one extra action.

traits.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: If the downcast mercenary fails a saving throw, it can reroll the saving throw and use the new roll.

traits.name: Thaumaturge
entries: The downcast mercenary can cast {@spell thaumaturgy} at will.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The downcast mercenary makes three attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3 damage) slashing damage.
